result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Reba L. Matelski

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Clerk: Kimberly
Case Called: 1:47pm
INCLUDES 15CF862, 15CF863, 15CF874, 15CF1015, and 15CM1848
State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo.  Deft appears in person, in custody, with Atty Thomas Roley

Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. VRCW.
State moves to:
15CF862: 
Ct. 2 Possess Drug Paraphernalia >> D&RI
Ct. 3 Possess/Illegally Obtained Prescription >> D&RI
15CF863:
Ct. 2 Possession of Methamphetamine >> D&RI
Ct. 3 Maintain Drug Trafficking Place >> D&RI
Ct. 4 Possession of THC >> D&RI
15CF874:
Ct. 1 Bail Jumping - Felony >> D&RI
Ct. 2 Possess Drug Paraphernalia >> D&RI
15CF1015:
Ct. 2 Bail Jumping - Felony >> D&RI
Ct. 3 Bail Jumping - Felony >> D&RI
Ct. 4 Bail Jumping - Misdemanor >> D&RI
15CM1848:
Ct. 1 Possess Drug Paraphernalia >> D&RI
COURT grants above

PLEA: 
15CF862: 
Ct. 1 Possession of Methamphetamine >> NO CONTEST
15CF863:
Ct. 1 Possess w/Intent-Heroin (<=3g) >> NO CONTEST
15CF1015:
Ct. 1 Bail Jumping - Felony >> NO CONTEST

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis, & def guilty. 
COURT ORDERS: w/ hold sentencing. 4 years probation, concurrent.
CONDITIONS: Complete any assessment, treatment, or counseling deemed necessary by agent. Maintain GFE in full time employment/schooling/combination of the two. Complete AODA with follow through, unless programming previously completed at NCHC is sufficient. Absolute sobriety from drugs and alcohol. Pay CC. Pay DNA sample and surcharge. 

Atty Roley to provide jail credit form to court

Adj: 2:09am

Clerk: Kimberly
Case Called: 9:29am
INCLUDES 15CF862, 15CF863, 15CF874, & 15CM1848
State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo.  Deft appears in person with Atty Thomas Roley
Date and time was set for Preliminary Hearing.  

Waiver of  Prelim filed in 15CF862, 15CF863, and 15CF874
COURT ques. Deft re: Waiver.   
COURT finds Waiver freely & vol. made, finds probable cause & binds Deft over for Trial.  
Information to be filed within 30 days. Reading waived
PLEA: NOT GUILTY 
Dates: to be set with Br 1 JA
Bond continues

Adj: 9:36pm
Atty Tom Roley appeared with Defendant - Waiver of Prelim on felony files with 15CM1848 to track

Includes 15CF862, 15CF863 and 15CM1848.    Contact Attic Correctional Services at 715-848-3202 with day reporting.  No controlled substances without valid prescription and only in the amount prescribed.  Absolute sobriety.
